text:
90-year-old #MargaretKeenan became the first person in the #UK to receive the #Pfizer/#BioNTech vaccine outside of a clinical trial👏👏👏. 

Huge moment indeed ! Let's hope it augurs well for effective treatment of #Covid19 #Coronavirus 😇😇
#vaccine #CoronavirusVaccine #women # https://t.co/k6jdlj3Q1h
